scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && tsc -b && vite build
scripts.build:cpp: cd src/cpp && emcc -O3 -s WASM=1 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS='["_predict", "_train", "_getActivations", "_initialize"]' -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["ccall", "cwrap"]' --bind music_rl_engine.cpp neural_network.cpp experience_buffer.cpp music_environment.cpp -I./eigen -o ../../public/music_engine.js
scripts.setup:eigen: cd src/cpp && curl -L https://gitlab.com/libeigen/eigen/-/archive/3.4.0/eigen-3.4.0.tar.gz | tar xz && mv eigen-3.4.0 eigen
